name: Racey Spacey Chasey
description:
Racey Spacey Chasey is a racing game ala Mario Kart, in space!

Players follow the solar winds, spinning through space in a track laid out, hitting boost gates, rotating the ship to get the best bonuses while trying to fight off a number of A.I. players, all to see who will be in front after 3 laps.

Also, barrel rolls.

Racey Spacey Chasey is a submission to the 2021 Kenney.nl Jam "Rotation".

Controls

Rotate left/right: W,S or Left, Right, or Numpad 4, Numpad 6

Fly up/down:

Shoot: Spacebar, Mouse Button Left

Boost: Ctrl

Brake: Shift

Barrel roll: Q, E or Del, PgDn or Numpad 7, Numpad 9

Pause: Escape, Start Button

Credits

Font : Modak - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Modak

Music : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/metroidvania-platformer-music-...
